name: Victory Race
description: Be fast, be first and be famous as the race returns in Victory Race. Experience aggressive racing against advanced AI and become immersed in the race.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7 , 8 , 8.1 , 10 Процессор: 2 GHz Dual-Core 32-bit CPU Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Место на диске: 30 MB
